Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia is the most developed solid electrolyte for use in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: Commercial yttria-stabilized zirconia powders reach high densification at temperatures higher than that of the usual anode materials.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: Reduction of the sintering temperature of the solid electrolyte could allow for co-firing of both ceramic components, thereby reducing production costs.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: The main purpose of this work was to study the effect of small cobalt additions on densification and on electrical conductivity of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: Linear shrinkage results show that the onset temperature for shrinkage decreases with increasing cobalt content.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy measurements reveal that the electrical conductivity depends on the sintering profile.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: For specimens sintered at 1400 degrees C for CA It the electrical conductivity of grains and grain boundaries are almost unchanged with that of 8YSZ.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: In contrast, for specimens sintered at the same temperature but for 0.5 h of soaking time, the electrical conductivity is higher in 0.025 mol% samples and is lower for 1 mol% Co doped 8YSZ.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition

Sentencas: Degradation of the microstructure by increased porosity was obtained for high additive contents.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of yttria-stabilized zirconia with cobalt addition
